ai-mil7.7.7:1.1_0: “Reverend Sister, what is the only one of these three treasures?”
ai-mil7.7.7:1.2_0: “Great king, the corpse of a gem is pure,
ai-mil7.7.7:1.3_0: In the same way, a meditator who has impure livelihood should be extremely pure in livelihood.
ai-mil7.7.7:1.4_0: This is the first jewel, great king.
ai-mil7.7.7:2.1_0: Furthermore, a jewel together with the treasurer does not abuse.
ai-mil7.7.7:2.2_0: In the same way, a meditator with bad friends.
ai-mil7.7.7:3.1_0: Furthermore, great king, one is a treasurer’s birth.
ai-mil7.7.7:3.2_0: In the same way, anyone who lives with your own hands, consumed by alcoholic drinks, clothes, and vehicles; in re-resenters, boards, dresses in ocher robes, and is fruitful when they are stream-enter.
ai-mil7.7.7:3.3_0: This is the third treasure of the jewel.
ai-mil7.7.7:3.4_0: The Buddha has said, great king, that when the Divinities of the Gods
ai-mil7.7.7:5.1_0: The seventh enquiry is the seventh (called) Daughter,
